trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the ash titan or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Draconic Might
entries: The ash titan can push any Huge or smaller creature it deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage to up to 10 feet away from it. This is halved to 5 feet if the target makes a save against the damage and succeeds.

trait.name: Unbreakable
entries: If the ash titan is {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained} at the start of its turn, any effect causing these conditions immediately end on the ash titan.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ash titan can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, the ash titan can make two attacks with its Lava Blast.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lava Blast
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 17} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: The ash titan sweeps its tail in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in the cone takes 19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 25} Dexterity save for half).

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the ash titan's choice that is within 120 feet of the ash titan and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ash titan's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The ash titan exhales fire in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage ({@dc 21} Dexterity save for half).

Any surface struck by this Fire Breath is scorched with magical fire for 1 minute. A target that ends its turn in the fire's space takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage ({@dc 21} Dexterity save for half).

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The ash titan makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Grapple
entries: The ash titan attempts to grapple one creature within 10 feet of it.

legendary.name: Tail (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ash titan uses its Tail action.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ash titan beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the ash titan takes 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage ({@dc 25} Dexterity save for half). On a failed save, a target is also knocked {@condition prone}. The ash titan can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Lava Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The ash titan creates a storm made up of magma and flame. The area of the storm consists of up to ten 10-foot cubes, which the ash titan can arrange as it wishes as long as each cube is within 200 feet of it. Each target that is in a cube takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage ({@dc 24} Dexterity save for half). A target in the area of more than one cube is affected only once.

The fire damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried. Additionally, any surface that is damaged by these cubes becomes difficult terrain until cleared. Each 5-foot-square portion of the area requires at least 1 minute to clear by hand.

reaction.name: Retaliate
entries: When the ash titan is hit by a melee attack, it can use its Tail action on an area that includes the attacker.

trait.name: Unbreakable (3/Day)
entries: If the daedric titan is {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained} at the start of its turn, any effect causing these conditions immediately end on the daedric titan.

trait.name: Draconic Imitation
entries: The draconic titan can push any Huge or smaller creature it deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage to up to 5 feet away from it. This doesn't occur if the target makes a save against the damage and succeeds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The daedric titan can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: The daedric titan sweeps its tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone takes 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 22} Dexterity save for half).

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the daedric titan's choice that is within 120 feet of the daedric titan and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the daedric titan's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The daedric titan exhales cold fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage ({@dc 21} Dexterity save for half).

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The daedric titan makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Grapple
entries: The daedric titan attempts to grapple one creature within 10 feet of it.

legendary.name: Soul Flame
entries: The daedric titan exhales a ball of cold fire at a target within 60 feet of it. The target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage ({@dc 19} Constitution save for half). If the target is a creature and it fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition poisoned} until the end of the daedric titan's next turn.

legendary.name: Tail (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The daedric titan uses its Tail action.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The daedric titan beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the daedric titan takes 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 22} Dexterity save for half). On a failed save, a target is also knocked {@condition prone}. The daedric titan can then fly up to half its flying speed.

reaction.name: Retaliate
entries: When the daedric titan is hit by a melee attack, it can use its Tail action on an area that includes the attacker.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the atronach dies, it explodes in a burst of fire. Each creature within 10 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage ({@dc 13} Dexterity save for half).

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: A creature that touches the atronach or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Ignite
entries: When the atronach deals fire damage to a creature or flammable object, the target ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The atronach sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the atronach moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The atronach makes two attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Repelling Flames
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage ({@dc 13} Dexterity save for half). A creature is pushed up to 10 feet away from the atronach on a failed save, or 5 feet away on a successful one.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the atronach dies, it explodes in a burst of lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage ({@dc 18} Dexterity save for half).

trait.name: Lightning Form
entries: A creature that touches the atronach, hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, or starts its turn within 10 feet of the atronach takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The atronach makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) lightning damage.

action.name: Arc Lightning
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) lightning damage. Each creature in a 5 foot wide line between the target and the atronach (excluding the atronach and the target) also takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage ({@dc 18} Dexterity save for half).

action.name: Lightning Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: The atronach unleashes a lightning storm in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage ({@dc 18} Dexterity save for half).

trait.name: Chilled Body
entries: A creature that touches the atronach or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the atronach dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage ({@dc 17} Dexterity save for half).

trait.name: Frost Aura
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the atronach is icy and is difficult terrain for creatures other than it. The radius moves with the atronach.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The atronach can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The atronach deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The atronach makes two attacks: one with its jab and one with its uppercut. Alternatively, the atronach makes three attacks against three different targets.

action.name: Jab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the end of the atronach's next turn.

action.name: Uppercut
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the atronach if it is Large or smaller.

action.name: Ground Slam {@recharge 5}
entries: The atronach slams its arm into the ground, releasing an explosion of jagged ice. Each creature within 10 feet of the atronach must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The seeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The seeker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Summon Clone (1/Day)
entries: If the seeker has half its hit points or fewer, it can use a bonus action to summon a weaker version of itself at a point within 15 feet of it. This clone lacks the Innate Spellcasting and Summon Clone traits, and only has 33 ({@dice 6d8 + 6}) hit points. The clone acts on the same initiative as its summoner, and follows its summoner's orders to the best of its ability. The clone dies if its summoner dies, if it is reduced to 0 hit points, or if it is ever more than 30 feet away from its summoner. Otherwise, the clone disappears after 1 minute.

action.name: Seeker Drain
entries: {@atk rs} automatic hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Knowledge Drain {@recharge 5}
entries: The seeker unleashes a blast of psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage ({@dc 15} Intelligence save for half). On a failed save, the seeker also magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

monster.name: Lurker
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lurker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The lurker regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the lurker takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the lurker's next turn. The lurker dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lurker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: The lurker spits a ball of acid at a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 9d4}) acid damage immediately and 12 ({@damage 5d4}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target is splashed with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

action.name: Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. A mass of tentacles fills a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder centered on the target. Each creature in the cylinder that isn't a lurker or {@creature seeker|DI} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage ({@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw for half). On a failed save, a target is also {@condition restrained} {@condition restrained}. The tentacles disappear at the end of the lurker's next turn, at which time any {@condition restrained} targets are released.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The lurker moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: The lurker makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Acid Spit (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lurker uses Acid Spit.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The clannfear has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that is bloodied.

trait.name: Aggressive Leap
entries: As a bonus action, the clannfear can jump up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see. If it attacks that creature on the same turn and hits, that creature is also knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clannfear makes two attacks: one with its claw and one with its tail.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aspect's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

2e: {@spell illusory dragon|XGE} (appearing as a {@creature daedric titan|DI})

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When the aspect drops to 0 hit points or dies, its body is destroyed but its essence travels back to his domain in Coldharbour.

trait.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the aspect must make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the aspect for 1 minute or until the creature is more than 60 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to the aspect's Frightful Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the aspect fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The aspect has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cold Fire
entries: Whenever the aspect deals cold fire damage, the damage dice are evenly split between necrotic damage and fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aspect makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace of Molag Bal (+3 Mace)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 21} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d6 + 12}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the aspect's next turn.

action.name: Cold Fire Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The aspect unleashes cold fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature within 20 feet of that point takes 42 ({@dice 12d6}) cold fire damage ({@dc 26} Constitution save for half). A target is also pushed up to 20 feet away from the aspect on a failed save, or half as far on a successful one.

legendary.name: Baleful Teleport
entries: The aspect uses its Teleport bonus action. Each creature within 10 feet of the space the aspect teleports to takes 22 ({@dice 4d10}) cold fire damage ({@dc 24} Constitution save for half) and is pushed up to 10 feet away from it.

legendary.name: Submit
entries: The aspect targets one creature it can communicate with via telepathy and forces it to move up to its speed in a manner of its choosing (no reaction required). Alternatively, it can force the creature to make a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw; on a failed save, the target falls {@condition prone} and can't stand up until the end of the target's next turn.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The aspect casts one innate spell that takes 1 action to cast, or it uses an action granted by the {@spell telekinesis} spell.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The aspect magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Command Daedra
entries: Each daedra of the aspect's choice that can see or hear the aspect can use its reaction to move up to its speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: Miraak is a 20th-level spellcaster. Miraak's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 25}, {@hit 17} to hit with spell attacks). Miraak can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If Miraak is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a saving throw to only take half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Dragon Aspect (Mythic Trait; 1/Rest).
entries: If Miraak would be reduced to 0 hit points, he can use a shout to reset his current hit point total to 350 instead. He then gains a +3 bonus to AC and a flying speed equal to his walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, the size and range/distance of his shouts are doubled in all dimensions.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: Miraak ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce his speed or cause him to be {@condition restrained}. He can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Miraak fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Miraak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Miraak casts or uses his at-will {@spell telekinesis} and makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Tentacle Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of Miraak's next turn.

action.name: Bend Will {@recharge 5}
entries: Miraak uses a shout to bend the will of one creature he can see within 60 feet of him, as the {@spell dominate monster} spell (save {@dc 25}, no concentration required), until the end of his next turn. If the target is a dragon, the effect lasts for 1 hour, and if the dragon fails the initial save by 5 or more, the effect becomes permanent, and it can't make saves to break the effect.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Miraak uses a shout to exhale fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage ({@dc 25} Dexterity save for half.

action.name: Cyclone {@recharge 5}
entries: Miraak uses a shout to creates a whirling cyclone that sows chaos among his enemies. The cyclone is a 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder that originates from Miraak and moves 60 feet in a straight line. Each creature that comes in contact with the cyclone is hurled 35 ({@dice 2d6 × 5}) feet away from it in a random direction and takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) bludgeoning damage ({@dc 25} Dexterity save for half).

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Miraak uses a shout to exhale an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) cold damage ({@dc 25} Constitution save for half). On a failed save, a creature's speed is also halved until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Unrelenting Force {@recharge 5}
entries: Miraak uses a shout to create a blast of energy that travels along a line 10 feet wide and 60 feet long. Each creature and object in the line takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage ({@dc 25} Strength save for half). On a failed save, a target is also knocked {@condition prone} and is pushed 20 feet away from Miraak.

legendary.name: Whirlwind Sprint
entries: Miraak uses a shout to move up to 60 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Tentacle Sword
entries: Miraak makes one attack using his tentacle sword.

legendary.name: Use a Shout (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Miraak uses one of his shouts.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dremora has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Deadly Critical
entries: The dremora scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20. On a critical hit, the dremora rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice, and each ally of the target that can see the dremora must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the dremora until the end of the dremora's next turn.

trait.name: Slaughter (1/Turn)
entries: If the dremora makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits a creature with it, the target takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage. If the target is {@condition frightened} or {@condition incapacitated}, the attack also becomes a critical hit.

trait.name: Alert
entries: The dremora has advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dremora makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The dremora adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the dremora must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Feast on Weakness
entries: When a hostile creature within 20 feet of the dremora fails a saving throw, the dremora regains 10 hit points.

reaction.name: Protective Retaliation
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the dremora makes an attack against one of the dremora's allies, the dremora can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.
